@VampireBeag 'Bless You' . Have you tried a hot port?
@DebsJRiccio I was flicking channels (not having watched the series) and that 'pause' was really weird! Surprised there wasn't a ticktock!
@Isabelwriter Nah - those dogs just have us under their spell!
@Isabelwriter House always feels so empty when mine goes off to kennels.
'In the fell clutch of circumstance, I have not winced nor cried aloud' #Invictus - RIP #joostvanderwesthuizen
@Swannyg66 @legsidelizzy Not sure he'd make a good England captain but I'd give him the run of the White House.

@Tracy_Kuhn Em - has the designer of that card never heard of Oedipus, and what happened to him???? (never mind his mother!).
@IrPsych Trump is certainly full of 'corn' - and he may eventually make things go 'pop' but not in a good way!!!
So far today I have changed & washed bedclothes, replaced the liner on the cooker extractor, and cleaned the hob. I need to lie down!
Just bought this song by @lspraggan - it's brilliant. https://t.co/E8GgymQr5d
@Keris No - I think that's a perfectly reasonable response. Some of the 'designer' stuff is totally impractical.
@EffingRainbow What is #muskedragons?
@InTheseHeels Probably Annie's Song with a rap overlay!
@InTheseHeels Oh yeah - and at a gallop!
@sharonstjohnny2 Thanks. Needless to say I think she's totally gorgeous.
@marybuckley549 Thanks. She does have a lovely face - imo anyway.
Jess got a new halter today - and an A+ from the Vet at her annual checkup. https://t.co/VDjtJsBwmA
It's Friday evening - and you know what that means? Pizza to be ordered & eaten, wine to be drunk, tv to be watched. #relax

@IrPsych Record one of them!
@judester55 @MuckrossHC I'd also think it needs better weather!
@tomdoorley Surely that's vandalism or defacing public property? Should be arrested!
@VampireBeag Who said anything about 'lies' - get your soundbite right - 'alternative facts'. @IrPsych
@IrPsych Ah yes, alternative facts!! Beggars belief that anyone could come out with that really. @VampireBeag
@VampireBeag The whole world is obsessed with DT at the moment. He'll start WW3 if he keeps on like this! @IrPsych
@K8JohnsonAuthor You're teasing again!! It wasn't 'will you marry me Max' was it???
@VampireBeag Oh dear, did you annoy @IrPsych by word or action???
@CloudSurferUK In your opinion!
@CloudSurferUK Yeah and I'm not even British happily! It is a daft decision. Way better in the club than out of it esp with Trump around.
@CloudSurferUK You'll all be sorry in the end though! #Brexit is just the daftest decision ever and based on inaccuracies & outright lies.
@kimnmilward Who's done what?
Good grief - that's a scary likeness! https://t.co/X4iSlSx2xn
@lomelindi12 Who can these days??!! ;-)
@akjames61 Welcome - and your book is STILL on my Kindle waiting to be read. I'm on the most recent Jack Reacher at the moment!

@miriamdonohoe Oh he's 'la la' all right - but sadly not remotely funny! @seanspicer

@miriamdonohoe The way assuming @seanspicer has a brain would also be misguided?!

@lomelindi12 Wasn't me but I am watching it - actually about half way through yesterday's episode at the moment. It's weirdly engaging.
@Whyjay99 Yeah, there's only so far doggie love will take you before 'home' is the better option! @MaudieStokes43
@MaudieStokes43 Just back from a dog walk in the drizzle. I think Jess was even less enthusiastic than I was!

@MoorseyL What - and you didn't invite us to the virtual meet up??!! @trishmmurphy

The wheels have come off Liverpool's season big time, haven't they?
@teelingtwit Have you seen this??
@Chiddle84 Tankinis are great - look like a swimsuit but with 'benefits' of a bikini! @ckingwriter
@Chiddle84 Only ONE dress?? What are you planning to wear (or not wear?!) the rest of the time?? @ckingwriter
@Whyjay99 Eugh - I imagine the Queen's corgis have better taste than that!
@Whyjay99 Corgis are small dogs - they might make it work!
@ckingwriter I forgot to ask @Chiddle84 that in my previous response to her. A bit of sun in March is always nice.
@Whyjay99 I'm hoping one of the corgis will bite him!! (when no one is watching of course - wouldn't want the dog in trouble!).
@barbarascully Careful now - 'journalist' is a big word for Katie to understand!!!
@Chiddle84 Bigger issues yes, but it's symptomatic of lack of ability/intelligence etc. - like bad grammar or spelling.
@Chiddle84 I was nearly 39 when I went on my first 'mainly sun only' holiday. Up till then it had been a mix of sun & sightseeing equally.
@Queen_UK Any chance you could set a few 'attack corgis' on him during the night when he's there??!!
@GinaBo Blame it on all the one way streets!! That's what I do anyway.
@jimwaterson How come this has never been an issue before now??? Surely UK birth dates have always been submitted in European format?
@IrPsych And this has never been an issue before now??!!!!
@julie_cohen Isn't it wonderful - totally brightens up my day when I come in from work or just down from being upstairs!
